User-agent: GPTBot
Allow: /

Allow: /

User-agent: ChatGPT-User
Allow: /

User-agent: PerplexityBot
Allow: /

User-agent: Bard
Allow: /

User-agent: BingAI
Allow: /

# Disallow admin areas if they exist
User-agent: *
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /private/
Disallow: /*.json$

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://tigrexmove.co.uk/sitemap.xml

# Crawl-delay for respectful crawling
Crawl-delay: 1
